title.value: ClimateSet: A Large-cale Climate Model Dataset for Machine Learning
title.justification: Title mentioned at the beginning of the paper
title.quote: ClimateSet: A Large-scale Climate Model Dataset for Machine Learning

extractions.description: The paper presents ClimateSet, a dataset containing inputs and outputs of 36 climate models from Input4MIPs and CMIP6 archives. It includes a modular pipeline for retrieving and preprocessing additional models and scenarios. The dataset is benchmarked for ML-based climate model emulation and showcases performance across different models.

type.justification: The paper provides data, implementation details, and performance benchmarks for machine learning models on the ClimateSet dataset.
type.quote: We introduce ClimateSet – a consistent, multi-climate-model dataset... We showcase the value of the dataset for the task of climate emulation.

name.justification: The paper focuses on creating a dataset and using it with machine learning models to address climate-related tasks.
name.quote: The machine learning (ML) community has taken increased interest in supporting the climate science community in their efforts to scale and accelerate climate-related modeling tasks.

name.justification: The dataset is benchmarked for machine learning-based climate model emulation tasks.
name.quote: We showcase the value of the dataset for the task of climate emulation.

name.justification: The paper describes a modular pipeline for retrieving and preprocessing climate model data.
name.quote: In addition, we provide a modular dataset pipeline for retrieving and preprocessing additional climate models and scenarios.

name.justification: ClimaX is mentioned as the current state-of-the-art machine learning model used for climate emulation tasks.
name.quote: ClimaX is the current state-of-the-art ML model on ClimateBench.

is_contributed.justification: ClimaX is not contributed by this paper but is used as a benchmark model.
is_contributed.quote: ClimaX is the current state-of-the-art ML model on ClimateBench.

is_executed.justification: The paper reports performance metrics for ClimaX on the ClimateSet dataset.
is_executed.quote: We trained most types of models that have been used for climate emulation on ClimateBench (Watson-Parris et al., 2022) to date: ... ClimaX

is_compared.justification: ClimaX is compared with other models in the benchmarking experiments.
is_compared.quote: We showcase the potential of our dataset by...analyzing their performance across different climate models.

referenced_paper_title.value: ClimaX: A Foundation Model for Weather and Climate
referenced_paper_title.justification: Referenced paper title for ClimaX as mentioned in the context of the paper.

name.justification: U-Net is used as a baseline model for climate emulation tasks in the paper.
name.quote: We added a U-Net as a simple baseline.

is_contributed.justification: U-Net is not contributed by this paper but is used as a baseline model.
is_contributed.quote: We added a U-Net as a simple baseline.

is_executed.justification: The U-Net model is trained and evaluated on the ClimateSet dataset.
is_executed.quote: We trained most types of models that have been used for climate emulation on ClimateBench...and ClimaX. We omitted the Random Forest...We added a U-Net as a simple baseline.

is_compared.justification: The U-Net model is compared with other models to evaluate its performance.
is_compared.quote: We found that U-Net outperformed all other ML models consistently.

referenced_paper_title.value: U-Net: Convolutional Networks for Biomedical Image Segmentation
referenced_paper_title.justification: Referenced paper title for U-Net as mentioned in the context of the paper.

name.justification: ConvLSTM is used as one of the models for climate emulation tasks in the paper.
name.quote: We trained most types of models that have been used for climate emulation...Convolutional long short-term memory (ConvLSTM)

is_contributed.justification: ConvLSTM is not contributed by this paper but is used as a model for comparison.
is_contributed.quote: We trained most types of models that have been used for climate emulation.

is_executed.justification: ConvLSTM is trained and its performance is evaluated on the ClimateSet dataset.
is_executed.quote: We trained most types of models that have been used for climate emulation...Convolutional long short-term memory (ConvLSTM)

is_compared.justification: ConvLSTM is compared with other models in the benchmarking experiments.
is_compared.quote: We showcase the potential of our dataset by using it as a benchmark for ML-based climate model emulation.

referenced_paper_title.justification: Referenced paper title for ConvLSTM as mentioned in the context of the paper.

name.justification: The paper introduces and describes the ClimateSet dataset in detail.
name.quote: Here, we introduce ClimateSet, a dataset containing the inputs and outputs of 36 climate models from the Input4MIPs and CMIP6 archives.

name.justification: CMIP6 is mentioned as the backbone of the ClimateSet data pipeline.
name.quote: The backbone of the ClimateSet data pipeline is the Coupled Model Intercomparison Project Phase 6 (CMIP6).

referenced_paper_title.value: Overview of the Coupled Model Intercomparison Project Phase 6 (CMIP6) Experimental Design and Organization
referenced_paper_title.justification: Referenced paper for CMIP6 as mentioned in the context of the paper.

name.justification: Input4MIPs is referenced as a part of the ClimateSet dataset, providing climate model inputs.
name.quote: ClimateSet – a consistent, multi-climate-model dataset...pipeline for retrieving and preprocessing climate model data from CMIP6 (climate model outputs) and Input4MIPs (climate model inputs) for climate-related ML tasks.

referenced_paper_title.value: input4MIPS: Making [CMIP] Model Forcing More Transparent
referenced_paper_title.justification: Referenced paper for Input4MIPs as mentioned in the context of the paper.
